record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="export" and term="Export table" and format.name="export" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: export
record.format.name: export

brief.brief: The export routine reads the entries in the export record to determine what fields to export and where to place those fields in the external file.
The structured array portion cannot be blank.

detail.detail: A validation program runs before Service Manager adds or updates the export record.
- Field names must be in the sequential order of the export.
- Field name, starting position and field length must be present.
The valid.application determines field type and array type.
- If the field type or array type is a 3 (date/time), you must indicate the date format. The default is mm/dd/yy.
- If the field type is an 8 or 9, array occ must be present.
- If the field type is an 8 and the array type is a 9, the starting position of the export line description cannot be less than the previous line's starting position + field length*array occur - 1.
